data.name: ConnectingToHostname
data.comment: part of the 'caption' parameter to CredUIPromptForWindowsCredentials; Displayed in the 'login' window at the top. param 0: hostname of the server we're connecting to

data.name: CredComment
data.value: Commvault Excel Data Cube Saved Credentials
data.comment: This is the string displayed in the Windows Credential Manager's entry for our program.

data.name: CredName
data.comment: This is the name of the credential saved in the Credential Manager.

data.name: ExceptionInLogon
data.value: Exception caught while processing logon on server [{0}]: [{1}]
data.comment: Param 0: hostname Param 1: Exception text

data.name: Hostname
data.comment: saved name of the 'hostname' attribute on the credential

data.name: NewWorkbook
data.value: A new workbook will be created.

data.name: NoActiveWorkbook
data.value: You must have a workbook loaded to export.
data.comment: Displayed in the backstage view when user 'tries' to export data to Data Cube without having any data loaded.

data.name: NoDataSourceSelected
data.value: You must have a data source selected in order to import.
data.comment: Displayed in the backstage view when user 'tries' to import data without giving us a data source first.

data.name: PleaseLogin
data.value: In order to interact with data form Data Cube, please login.

data.name: PromptEnterCreds
data.comment: 'message' parameter to CredUIPromptForWindowsCredentials; Displayed in the 'login' window when getting username/password combo

data.name: ShowOnlyTheseTypes
data.value: Show only these types of data source

data.name: UnableToGetRemoteData
data.value: We were unable to properly pull the data from the server. Error: {0}
data.comment: Parameter 0: error message

data.name: YouWillBeLoggedOut
data.value: You will be logged out after 30 minutes of inactivity.

data.name: NewSheet
data.value: A new sheet will be created for this import.

data.name: SavedLoginFailure
data.value: We were unable to log you in using your saved credentials. To continue, please login again.

data.name: CreateNewDatasourceName
data.value: Type the name of the new datasource below.

data.name: CreateNewWhatIndexServer
data.value: On which index server should the new datasource be located?

data.name: ExportFlavorText
data.comment: Displayed below the export header in the backstage view

data.name: ImportFlavorText
data.comment: Displayed below the import header in the backstage view

data.name: NeedHostname
data.value: Please enter the hostname of the webconsole server to continue logging in.

data.name: RestApiExceptionText
data.value: Exception caught while executing rest API [{0}] on host [{1}]. Error message: {2}.
data.comment: Parameter 0: Api web request partial url (everything following the webconsole API path) Parameter 1: Hostname of the webconsole server. Parameter 2: Error message from the exception.

data.name: UnknownAPIException
data.value: Unknown API "{0}" --> unable to resolve HttpMethod.
data.comment: Parameter 0: Api path.

data.name: UseExistingTypeFilterText
data.value: Limit search results to this type of datasource:

data.name: CreateErrorText
data.value: Error occured during datasource creation; no new datasource was created. Error message: {0}
data.comment: Parameter 0: Error text from RestAPI method

data.name: CreatePostErrorText
data.value: Error occured during data posting; data source created but no data added. Error message: {0}
data.comment: Parameter 0: Error text from RestAPI method

data.name: CreateSuccess
data.value: Datasource successfully created. Spreadsheet data successfully posted.

data.name: PostErrorText
data.value: Error occured during data posting; no data was posted to the datasource. Error message: {0}
data.comment: Parameter 0: Error text from RestAPI method

data.name: UseSelectedRegion
data.value: Use selected region instead of whole file.

data.name: TruncationWarning
data.value: Some data was truncated while importing. Fields with length over 32,767 were automatically shortened to fit.
data.comment: 32767 is the maximum number of characters that can fit in an Excel cell. Seems like Microsoft uses a short int to hold string length.

data.name: UnableToRetrieveSchema
data.value: Unable to retrieve schema for validation.

data.name: NumTextWarning
data.value: Some numeric data was explicitly converted to text in order to preserve precision.

data.name: SchemaValidationFailure
data.value: The data failed to validate against the datasource's schema. No data was posted.

data.name: LoadingBarText
data.comment: Parameter 0: how many records have been processed. Parameter 1: How many in total there are.

data.name: NoDataMessage
data.value: The selected datasource seems to have no data assiociated with it.

data.name: DataFailedTypeCheck
data.value: Your dataset has failed the pre-export type validation check. Some values in your data are inconsistent with the server-side schema in place on the data source. Please check over the schema now and try again after adjusting your data.

data.name: TypeCheckConflictNotification
data.value: The cell which failed the type check is {0}. The expected type was {1} but {0} had a {2} in it.
data.comment: Parameter 0: Offending cell address Parameter 1: Expected type Parameter 2: Cell's true type

data.name: TypeLongString
data.comment: wchar_t*?

data.name: TypeLowercaseString
data.comment: ?? a lowercase string is a brand new type ??

data.name: TypeText
data.comment: ??? what's the difference between string and text ???

data.name: ValidationCreateNew
data.value: Please verify that each column's type is correct before proceeding.

data.name: ValidationUseExistingNEWCOLUMNS
data.value: Data types were inferred for the following unknown columns. Please ensure that the correct data types are listed below before clicking continue.

data.name: LiveWorkbookSyncError
data.value: This workbook has one or more worksheets which cannot be synchronized with the server you are currently logged into.

data.name: WeWillUseThisSheet
data.value: We'll use this sheet for the import.

data.name: UnableToGetRemoteDataAmbiguous
data.value: We were unable to properly pull the data from the server.

data.name: DateOOBWarning
data.value: Some date data in this set falls outside the bounds of the numerical datatype used to store it. These offending dates have been converted to textual data to preserve precision.

data.name: UnableToUpdateRemoteSchema
data.comment: Param 0: The error/exception text.

data.name: ErrorHeadersNeedAlphaNumericChars
data.value: One or more of your headers contain non-alphanumeric characters which are not allowed in a field name. Please choose different field names.

data.name: WorkbookOpenSyncNotification
data.value: The synchronized worksheet {0} is out of date. Did you want to pull down updated data from {1} now?
data.comment: Param 0: Worksheet name Param 1: Server hostname

data.name: UnableToContinue
data.value: An operation failed and is unable to continue.

data.name: UnableToGetRemoteDataNoParam
data.value: We were unable to properly pull the data from the server.

data.name: ErrSchemaModelInvalidUsage
data.value: SchemaModel values are not of type DSFieldType and cannot be jsonified!

data.name: ErrTooManyColumns
data.value: Excel cannot store more than {0} columns.
data.comment: Param 0: EXCEL_MAX_COLS

data.name: ErrUnsupportedType
data.value: Addin does not support Excel conversions to type {0}
data.comment: Param 0: the name of the offending type
